questions.title: 你喜欢吃我做的鸡翅吗？
questions.answer: Do you enjoy eating the chicken wings I cook?

questions.title: 你和你的家人喜欢我设计的旅程吗？
questions.answer: Do you and your families enjoy the journey I have designed?

questions.title: 你的儿子有好的逻辑思维，他喜欢数学吗？
questions.answer: Your son has a good logical thinking, does he enjoy maths?

questions.title: 你喜欢在夕阳西下的时候独自一人走在海边吗？
questions.answer: Do you enjoy walking at the seaside alone when the sun is setting?

title: ——你喜欢看言情小说吗？它可以让我快乐。
——看言情小说就是浪费时间。

answer.en: Do you enjoy reading romantic novels?It can make me happy.
Reading romantic novels is a waste of time.
Do you enjoy going for a walk in the country in spring?
Yes, the sun is shining and the air is fresh.
